content: original knitting patterns latvian braid hat ©2019 molly conroy-ungerecht all rights reserved sizes small/medium 19 - 20 medium/large 21 - 22 1 e g a p materials one skein manos del uruguay alegria grande 75% extra fine merino 25% nylon 180m/197 yds 100g color ag 2121 cinnamon mc one skein manos del uruguay alegria grande 75% extra fine merino 25% nylon 180m/197 yds 100g color ag 8855 pindo cc 16 size us 6 circular knitting needles 16 size us 7 circular knitting needles set of four size us 7 double pointed knitting needles nine stitch markers one of a different color yarn needle or large embroidery needle gauge 5 sts and 7 row to 1 on stockinette stitch circular gauge using larger knitting needles abbreviations beg = begin ning s btwn = between cc = contrasting color co = cast on cont = continue dpn = double pointed needles g = gram s k = knit k2tog = knit 2 stitches together makes decrease of 1 stitch m = meter s mc = main color oz = ounce s p = purl pm = place stitch marker on needle rem = remain ed ing s repeat s = repeat ed ing s round s = round s st s = stitch es w/ = with yd s = yard s 2 e g a p directions beg at brim of hat using smaller circular needle and mc cast on 92 96 sts pm to indicate beg of rnds join to work in rnds latvian braid rnds 1 2 w/ mc p round 3 k1 w/ mc k1w/ cc repeat to end left pointing braid round 4 bring both yarns to the front of your work with the main color on top to start p1 w/mc bring cc on top of mc yarn and p1 cont twisting yarns over each other as you p into like colors do not try to unwind yarn as you work it will untwist on the next round round 5 repeat round 4 wrapping the yarns under each other rather than over round 6 w/ mc k rnds 7 8 w/ mc p round 9 w/ mc k2 w/ cc k2 repeat to end rnds 10 15 w/ mc k2 w/ cc p2 repeat to end round 16 w/mc k rnds 17 18 w/ mc p round 19 repeat round 3 round 20 bring both yarns to the front of your work with the main color under cc p1 w/mc bring cc under of mc yarn and p1 cont twisting yarns under each other as you p into like colors round 21 repeat round 20 wrapping the yarns over each other rather than under cut cc when done round 22 with mc k rnds 23 24 with mc p change to larger needles and k every round with mc until hat measures 6 from co edge crown decreases small size using mc only change to dpns when necessary round 1 k2tog k44 sts k2tog k to
